title: App Deep Link Opened
description: Fired when the application is opened via a deep link.

url.description: The deep link URL that was opened.

source.description: The source that generated the deep link.

campaignId.description: The campaign identifier associated with the deep link, if any.

isDeferred.description: Whether the deep link was deferred (i.e. the app was not installed at the time of click).

matchType.description: The method used to match the deep link to the user.
